ai-patthana22.21:0.2_0: under the influence of the Dhamma: the Protector of the Three Worlds
ai-patthana22.21:0.3_0: Only Extinguishments are the cause of reasons.
ai-patthana22.21:1.1_0: without placing the mind and keeping it connected. You shouldn’t give rise to placing the mind and keeping it connected. You should give rise to cause a reason.
ai-patthana22.21:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.21:2.1_2: that’s not the fifteenth day sabbath.
ai-patthana22.21:3.1_0: One should not give a teaching for the sake of rapture, nor for the sake of rapture.
ai-patthana22.21:3.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.21:4.1_0: (These eighth causes and reasons) the eight roams of non-violence ...
ai-patthana22.21:5.1_0: One should not give up without seeing the cause, for the sake of not seeing, be given up with reasons.
ai-patthana22.21:5.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.21:7.1_0: (They are) not given up through seeing causes and reasons to give up the cause of reason for the sake of development.
ai-patthana22.21:7.1_1: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana22.21:11.1_0: or causes and reasons to give rise to the teaching,
